verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> and Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>. Great <WH1419> is the YY <WH3068>, and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984> <WH8794> in the city <WH5892> of our 'Elohim <WH430>, in the mountain <WH2022> of his holiness <WH6944>.

Beautiful <WH3303> for situation <WH5131>, the joy <WH4885> of the whole earth <WH776>, is mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>, on the sides <WH3411> of the north <WH6828>, the city <WH7151> of the great <WH7227> King <WH4428>.
'Elohim <WH430> is known <WH3045> <WH8738> in her palaces <WH759> for a refuge <WH4869>.
For, lo, the kings <WH4428> were assembled <WH3259> <WH8738>, they passed by <WH5674> <WH8804> together <WH3162>.
They saw <WH7200> <WH8804> it, and so they marvelled <WH8539> <WH8804>; they were troubled <WH926> <WH8738>, and hasted away <WH2648> <WH8738>.
Fear <WH7461> took hold <WH270> <WH8804> upon them there, and pain <WH2427>, as of a woman in travail <WH3205> <WH8802>.
Thou breakest <WH7665> <WH8762> the ships <WH591> of Tarshish <WH8659> with an east <WH6921> wind <WH7307>.

As we have heard <WH8085> <WH8804>, so have we seen <WH7200> <WH8804> in the city <WH5892> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, in the city <WH5892> of our 'Elohim <WH430>: 'Elohim <WH430> will establish <WH3559> <WH8787> it for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>. Selah <WH5542>.
We have thought <WH1819> <WH8765> of thy lovingkindness <WH2617>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, in the midst <WH7130> of thy temple <WH1964>.
According to thy name <WH8034>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, so is thy praise <WH8416> unto the ends <WH7099> of the earth <WH776>: thy right hand <WH3225> is full <WH4390> <WH8804> of righteousness <WH6664>.
Let mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>, let the daughters <WH1323> of Y'hudah <WH3063> be glad <WH1523> <WH8799>, because of thy judgments <WH4941>.
Walk about <WH5437> <WH8798> TZiyon <WH6726>, and go round about <WH5362> <WH8685> her: tell <WH5608> <WH8798> the towers <WH4026> thereof.
Mark <WH7896> <WH8798> ye well <WH3820> her bulwarks <WH2430>, consider <WH6448> <WH8761> her palaces <WH759>; that ye may tell <WH5608> <WH8762> it to the generation <WH1755> following <WH314>.
For this 'Elohim <WH430> is our 'Elohim <WH430> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>: he will be our guide <WH5090> <WH8762> even unto death <WH4192>.
